section.title: Deploy the Application using Server Manager
section.para: The TicketMonster application can be deployed on the JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6 runtime server instance created earlier in the tutorial. The procedure below guides you through how to so this.

procedure.title: Deploy the Application Using Server Manager

step.para: In the Project Explorer tab, right-click on ticket-monster and click Run As→Run on Server.
In the Run On Server wizard, ensure Choose an existing server is selected.

In the Select the server that you want to use table, select JBoss EAP 6.0 Runtime Server and click Finish. If not already in view, the Console tab automatically opens and shows the runtime server output.

A Web Browser tab automatically opens and displays the web page of the running TicketMonster application. In the Web Browser tab, enter sample Member data in the Member Registration pane and click Register. The submitted data is displayed in the Members table, which is visible on the web page.
